page.title: 17A Day in the Life of......
page.content: Mum gets me up at 8 o'clock,opening the curtains to let the morning sunshine in.I slowly put my school clothes on and go downstairs. Mum has the T.V. on and Ann Diamond is giving the time..8.15.Mum comes in with a tray of cornflakes and coffee, and my brother Gavin appears to eat his.After finishing, I go to the bathroom to get washed and do my teeth,spray perfume on my neck and then do my hair.Time is 8.35 and Gavin is almost ready for school.I leave, Gavin a few paces in front of me.It's warming up outside, and my friends are waving to me.We get into school, and it's a page of 'averages' to do for maths.I can't wait to get outside into the sun.After playtime,we do Domesday work.Lunchtime, and I walk home for a salad.The afternoon is easy and slow.My Science is done and it's time
